author: Dale Driver
title: 21 Brilliant Little Details in Resident Evil 3
description: From easter eggs, references and awesome design touches, we've found 21 brilliant little details in Resident Evil 3. Warning, contains spoilers!
content:
Resident Evil is back! And in classic fashion, Capcom isnt afraid to load it up with a ton of cool easter eggs, references and nods to the past. Here are 21 brilliant little details weve found so far in Resident Evil 3.
Beware this is going to contain spoile… [+9104 chars]
